features: SKINCARE ON THE GO: The e.l.f. Jet Set Hydration Kit contains all of your skincare favourites in a TSA-ready travel-sized kit. The kit includes a Cleanser (30ml), Hydrating Balm (6g), Moisturizer (25ml), Eye Cream (7g) and Night Cream (15g).
NOURISHING & HYDRATING PRODUCTS: Each of these products is packed with nourishing ingredients such as Aloe, Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E, Peptides and Hyaluronic Acid.
FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: This skincare set is perfectly compatible with all skin types.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% cruelty-free and Vegan.

HOW TO USE: Cleanse with Daily Face Cleanser & warm water. Tone with Prep & Hydrate Balm by applying all over the face in circular motions. Hydrate in the daytime with Daily Hydration Moisturizer & Eye Cream and in the evening with Nourishing Night Cream.
body.description: What it is: Five hydrating skincare favorites packed in one travel-sized kit. Why we love: A complete skincare routine in one kit TSA-friendly sizes Moisturizing, vitamin-infused formulas Key Ingredients: Citric Acid - Gently exfoliates and evens skin tone Cucumber Extract - Calms skin and reduces puffiness Shea Butter - Nourishes and softens skin Aloe Vera - Soothes and provides anti-inflammatory benefits Jojoba Oil - Locks in moisture Vitamin E - Brings a refreshing moisture boost A skincare routine that’s ready to go where you are! This convenient travel-sized kit includes five moisturizing skincare faves that will deeply nourish, brighten, and soothe all skin types. Each product packs a punch and is infused with skin-quenching ingredients that will hydrate your skin from the inside out. Kit includes: Daily Face Cleanser (30ml) - A gentle daily cleanser infused with Citric Acid that removes dirt, impurities, and makeup while brightening skin. Prep and Hydrate Balm (6g) - A water-based balm stick that instantly hydrates, improves skin texture, and preps skin for makeup application. Daily Hydration Moisturizer (25 ml) - A lightweight cream moisturizer infused with essential nutrients to deeply nourish the skin. Nourishing Night Cream (15g) - A soothing and calming cream that revitalizes the skin overnight. Illuminating Eye Cream (7g) - A rich and nourishing eye cream that reawakens your delicate eye area. All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and leaping bunny certified. Because kindness is chic. "

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PROUDLY FREE FROM Phthalates, parabens, nonylphenol ethoxylates, triclosan, triclocarban, and hydroquinone. 100% VEGAN AND CRUELTY-FREE Proud to be vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide. Because kindness is chic. WE ARE FOR YOU Your originality is infinite, and we are inspired by what makes you unique.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic travel set!
reviews.reviewText: I love these products. The facial cleanser is my favorite because it works so well, leaving skin feeling very clean and smooth. I love the moisturizers as well, though I don't use the night product because it's too heavy for me. This is a perfect set for air travel, with everything in its own clear carrying case. I liked it so much, I sent one as a gift to my niece when she was going on vacation. I think e.l.f has really good products at an awesome price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Take the chance and buy it
reviews.reviewText: I don’t usually write reviews, but since this is the one line of products that literally makes me think “wow” every time I use it.. I had to!So I’m not the best at keeping up with skin care, but I think that’s because previous lines don’t show immediate results on my skin or they’re too expensive to try.Immediately you’re going to feel the difference in texture. I didn’t realize how rough my face was until I started using this. So that’s great! Since this is just a hydration line, I’d recommend pairing it with an exfoliant once a week. I have two concerns with any new skin care product: 1. Will this make me break out? And 2. Will my skin be gross and flakey if I stop using this everyday? I’ve had these products for two months and they haven’t made me break out and I LOVE that if I skip a few days, my skin never dries up. Even though this is a small travel kit, there’s more than enough product, I haven’t ran out yet.For the eye cream, I literally touch the product and it’s enough for both eyes. Same with the night cream, I’ll dip in for not even a small blob of product and my whole face and neck are moisturized.I say it’s worth the try! It’s not expensive either so it makes the jump to try much easier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice travel or on the go set!
reviews.reviewText: This set is so amazing for weekend travel or just on the go refresher. The face wash doesn't dry my skin out and the face cream is luxurious. I also love the prep stick and the eye cream which I use under my concealer to help prevent lines and cracking. My makeup goes on so flawlessly after using these prodects and my natural skin has never looked better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great travel set!
reviews.reviewText: I have crazy dry skin, especially on vacation when my skin is exposed more to sun, salt water and chlorinated water. My skin is also super sensitive so I wanted something light. This little set really came in clutch! Some days I had to reapply the moisturizer (super beach days) but most days it kept me moisturized and fresh! There is a slight scent, and it isn’t too bad, but something to take caution of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have super oily skin, some redness, and some adult acne. I tried this line after being disappointed with some expensive products that were aiming for hydration and left me greasy. I absolutely freakin love it, my face feels so clean and soft. I don’t know if my skin has been so soft and healthy feeling maybe ever. So far no break outs or irritation. I’ve even purchased the moisturizer with sunscreen full size, and I plan on getting the face wash full size. I haven’t traveled with the kit but I think the products would be fine. My only annoyance is that they don’t make the prep and balm stick in full size anywhere. It is an odd product, and at first I was wondering what kind of witchcraft it was. It works well and feels great on, and I finished it first out of everything in the kit. I don’t want to buy a new kit every time I run out of the stick because the moisturizer, eye cream, and night moisturizer are all going to last several more weeks. ELF please make the balm stick in full size ?! I think it’s worth the money to try it, I usually don’t end up liking everything in a line, but this one I do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m just here to remind you all that this is travel size I made the mistake of thinking this was full-size and I just wanted to remind you all that it’s travel. But overall this product is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to love this
reviews.reviewText: I loved this all at first but after a week of use, I noticed my skin was getting bumpy and dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love!!!
reviews.reviewText: This little Elf jet set hydration kit is the real deal!! I LOVE everything- these products really moisturize my skin- and a little goes a long way! I do not notice any scent- if there is one it’s super mild. They are the PERFECT size for travel- and the price is great. I love this set so much- I’m going to get the full-sized products now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the product they have done wonders for my skin.The only downside is the size, I would like larger sizes for use at home.
Sehr gut für unreine und sensible Haut! Hilft sehr gut
pratique pour un voyage et bons produits

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 27, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This kit is so perfect for dry, sensitive skin.It’s perfect for travel and such a value for money, you get a very nice amount of product for such a low price, Kits like this would normally be around £20.The products are easily identifiable and work extremely well, using this set I cleared my dry skin up in 3 days.The products have a gentle, clean scent, perfect for anyone that does not enjoy overpowering scents.Perfect set for gifts, travel and everyday use.
